communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: Next week, I'm tying the knot in a park with my fiancé. My family isn't thrilled about him, but my dog will be the ring bearer, making it special. We're heading to Niagara Falls for our honeymoon. Amidst all this, I've been sharing my 'discipline' tips online, framing restrictive eating as a way to control my body. It's been a stressful time, but these 'hacks' keep me going.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm all about discipline and control, especially when it comes to my body. I share 'hacks' on fasting and calorie restriction, helping others achieve the same level of body control. No medical jargon here, just real tips for real results. Let's get fit together!
